Source.Name: notes
Source.Summary: Note-taking application, write down your thoughts.
Source.Description: Note taking application, write down your thoughts. Notes is a tool for the things you need to write down off your brain. It is your place of expressing yourself. Notes is an open source and cross-platform project, and you're welcome to be part of it and contribute. We hope you will love it as much as we do.
